full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BLA MA'I BKA' 'DRIN RJES SU DRAN PA GSOL 'DEBS TSUL DANG DNGOS GRUB MYUR DU 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RANG GI SLOB MA BLANG DOR LA DPYOD PA'I BLO LDAN DGE TSUL NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS ZHES BGYIS PAS, DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I BLA MA'I BKA' 'DRIN TSUL STON PA'I BKA' 'DRIN GSOL 'DEBS SOGS YIG CHA MANG PO 'DUG KYANG BLO DMAN RTOGS DKA' BAR 'DUG PAS GO BDE BA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BAN RGAN SNYOMS LAS PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS SDOM PA, LUNG RGYUN KHRID RGYUN DBANG SOGS BLA MA SO SO LAS THOS PAS SHAS CHE BAS BLA MA SO SO'I DMIGS GSAL GYI BKA' DRIN BSAM TSUL MTSON BYED CI GO BDE BA DANG BKA' 'DRIN DRAN PA'I SGO NAS GSOL 'DEBS TSUL BLO DMAN GYIS KYANG GO BDE BAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO DGE TSUL NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN,
